price: دوزاخ ئۇلارنى يىراقتىن كۆرگەن چاغدا، ئۇلار دوزاخنىڭ غەزەپتىن قاينىغان ۋە (ئېشەكتەك) ھاڭرىغان ئاۋازنى ئاڭلايدۇ[12].
arabic: إِذَا رَأَتۡهُم مِّن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ سَمِعُواْ لَهَا تَغَيُّظٗا وَزَفِيرٗا

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: idhā ra-athum min makānin baʿīdin samiʿū lahā taghayyuẓan wazafīran
